overview: In 2020, three filmmakers visited Britainâ€™s most haunted village - Pluckley, in Kent - to shoot a documentary about its many legendary ghosts, and to conduct their own paranormal investigation. The three soon discover that the stories and legends are all true, and that the notorious "screaming woods" hold a very sinister past.
tagline: If you go in search of the dead, you might just find them.
title: The Screaming Woods
